duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop web applications using Angular and Node.js to create interactive web interfaces.
Write clean, modular, debuggable TypeScript code for web applications.
Build and consume JSON-based RESTful APIs for web application functionality.
Utilize Chrome Dev Tools for strong debugging skills during application development.
Work with JIRA to manage and track project tasks and issues.
Collaborate with an Agile team to deliver high-quality web applications.
